author: Simon Difford
description: A couple of dashes orange bitters helps add a touch of complexity and balance to this vodka-laced fruity cocktail, but beware those bitters may add trace amounts of sugar.
name: Passion Fruit Altern'atini (no added sugar & low-cal.)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruits in half and scoop out flesh into shaker (keep one half for garnish)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
